text: They say the moon landing was faked in a Hollywood studio to win the Cold War.
Chemtrails? Just condensation, or something more nefarious being sprayed on us?
Big Pharma profits from keeping people sick, not curing them, some believe.
The Earth is flat. Satellites are hoaxes, and gravity is a lie, according to some circles.
9/11 was an inside job. The official narrative doesn't add up, they claim.
The government controls our minds with fluoride in the water supply, so they say.
Aliens are here, working with governments in secret underground bases. Allegedly.
COVID-19 was planned to control the population through vaccines and lockdowns.
Global warming is a hoax perpetrated to impose taxes and regulations. Others think otherwise.
The Illuminati, a secret society, controls the world's finances and governments.
Princess Diana's death was no accident; it was orchestrated by the royal family.
Birds Aren't Real. The government replaced all birds with drones. Fact? Fiction?
The Denver Airport has secret underground bunkers and apocalyptic murals.
The Georgia Guidestones are a blueprint for a New World Order, according to theorists.
JFK was assassinated by the CIA to prevent him from revealing alien secrets.
Area 51 is where the government hides alien technology and captured spacecraft.
HAARP controls the weather. Earthquakes and hurricanes are artificially created.
Lizard people secretly control the world from positions of power and influence.
MKUltra involved the CIA experimenting on unwitting citizens with mind control.
The Titanic was swapped with its sister ship, the Olympic, for insurance fraud, some say.
The moon landing was faked. Stanley Kubrick directed the footage in a Hollywood studio.
Chemtrails are deliberately sprayed chemicals from airplanes for weather modification or population control.
The Earth is flat, not a globe. Governments and scientists are conspiring to hide the truth.
Aliens exist and the government knows it. They are secretly communicating with extraterrestrial life.
COVID-19 was engineered in a lab, either intentionally or accidentally, and released to cause a pandemic.
Big Pharma suppresses natural cures for diseases to maintain profits from medication sales.
Secret societies, like the Illuminati, control world events and manipulate governments from behind the scenes.
The U.S. government was involved in the 9/11 attacks, allowing them to justify wars and increase surveillance.
Princess Diana's death was not an accident; she was assassinated by the British royal family or intelligence agencies.
The Denver International Airport contains hidden symbols and artwork indicating a sinister New World Order agenda.
Vaccines cause autism, despite scientific evidence to the contrary. This is being covered up by the medical establishment.
The Bilderberg Group, a private conference, secretly makes decisions affecting global politics and economics.
The Georgia Guidestones outline a plan for global population control, suggesting a reduction to 500 million people.
The Rothschild family controls the world's finances and influences governments through their banking network.
MKUltra was a CIA mind-control program, and its legacy continues to influence current events.
The Philadelphia Experiment involved the U.S. Navy making a ship invisible, but had disastrous consequences.
The Reptilian Elite are shape-shifting aliens who control governments and financial institutions.
HAARP (High-Frequency Active Auroral Research Program) is being used for weather modification or to create earthquakes.
Area 51 holds alien technology and secrets that the government is hiding from the public.
The New World Order seeks to establish a totalitarian global government, suppressing individual liberties.
The moon landing was faked. It happened in a Hollywood studio to win the space race.
Big Pharma is suppressing natural cures for profit, keeping people sick.
Chemtrails are chemicals sprayed from airplanes to control the weather or human population.
The Earth is flat, and governments are hiding the truth for unknown reasons.
9/11 was an inside job orchestrated by the U.S. government.
Secret societies like the Illuminati control world events behind the scenes.
Aliens have visited Earth and governments are covering up the evidence.
COVID-19 was a hoax or a bio-weapon created in a lab.
The government uses fluoride in drinking water to control the population.
Vaccines cause autism, despite scientific evidence to the contrary.
Princess Diana's death was not an accident but a planned assassination.
The Bilderberg Group secretly determines global policies.
The Denver Airport contains hidden messages about a New World Order.
Reptilian humanoids are secretly ruling the world.
HAARP controls the weather and can create earthquakes.
The Georgia Guidestones outline a plan for population control.
Area 51 hides alien technology and other government secrets.
The Rothschild family controls the world's finances.
MKUltra was a mind control program to weaponize manipulation tactics.
Global warming is a hoax perpetrated by scientists for funding.
They say the moon landing was faked in a Hollywood studio. But where's the evidence, really? It's just something people talk about.
I heard that the Earth is flat and all the photos are a government hoax. Pretty wild, if you ask me.
Chemtrails? It's just condensation. Or is it? Some say it's a plot to control the weather or something sinister.
Vaccines cause autism? It's a claim that's been repeatedly debunked, yet it still circulates. Interesting, huh?
Big Pharma's suppressing a cure for cancer? It makes you wonder if profit truly outweighs human well-being. Deep thoughts.
The Illuminati control everything. Music, politics, world events... all them! Or so the story goes, at least.
9/11 was an inside job. World Trade Center, controlled demolition... very serious accusations that seem popular.
Aliens are real, and the government knows about it. The Roswell incident proves it... or does it?
Lizard people are secretly running the world! Seems like a far fetched idea to me.
The New World Order is coming to take away all your freedoms. But like, why? Just doesn't make much sense to me.
The Denver Airport is full of clues and hidden messages. Seems like someone got pretty creative.
Princess Diana was murdered by the royal family. No evidence has shown this so far.
Climate change is a hoax perpetrated by scientists. The polar bear population might disagree.
The Rothschilds control the world's finances. Seems like an unfair assessment of a group of people.
The Titanic never sank. It was switched with another ship. Insurance fraud, really?
Elvis is still alive and living in Argentina. Pretty sure his gravestone is the proof.
The government uses mind control through television. The Simpsons definitely can not foresee that.
Area 51 is hiding extraterrestrial technology. It's in the middle of the dessert after all.
Paul McCartney died in 1966 and was replaced by a look-alike. Some of his fans believe it though!
The Georgia Guidestones are blueprints for a new world order. Not so sure about it.
The moon landing was faked; discrepancies in shadows prove it.
Chemtrails are evidence of government weather modification programs.
The Earth is flat, despite NASA's images.
Vaccines cause autism; the research is being suppressed.
Big Pharma is hiding the cure for cancer for profit.
9/11 was an inside job, orchestrated by the US government.
The Illuminati control the world's governments and economies.
Aliens are visiting Earth, but governments are covering it up.
The Denver Airport's murals predict a global catastrophe.
Princess Diana's death was a planned assassination.
Lizard people are secretly ruling our society.
The New World Order aims to establish a totalitarian global government.
The Georgia Guidestones outline a plan for population control.
The Bilderberg Group secretly influences global politics.
Area 51 is a secret base housing alien technology.
The Titanic was sunk on purpose to eliminate opposition to the Federal Reserve.
The Protocols of the Elders of Zion details a Jewish plot for global domination.
MKUltra was a mind control program run by the CIA.
HAARP is a weapon that can control the weather.
The Rothschild family controls the world's finances.
